sect3.title: The File Manager
sect3.para: Nautilus continues to become the fastest and most stable file browser available, with the focus of Nautilus &version; being increased stability and speed.
Nautilus now has improved interoperability with other applications (such as Mozilla and Firefox) and more navigation options in both spatial and browser modes.

Part of improving the stability of Nautilus &version; involved the removal of the venerable Bonobo Views. These have now been replaced by the more powerful Nautilus Views. Nautilus Views allow the Nautilus file browser to be more easily extensible by other developers. Allowing Nautilus to display data in a variety of different ways.
